extension.name: Chatra
extension.author: Roger Wilco LLC
extension.description:
Chatra live chat module
1. Navigate to Extensions -> Modules, Press "New" and choose "Chatra" module from the list. Open Chatra module settings.
2. Sign up for a free Chatra account at app.chatra.io, then copy and paste your Widget code from "Setup & customize" section into the "Widget Code" form in your Chatra module settings. Press the "Save" button.
3. Set other module settings to:
  • Status: Published.
  • Position: choose Top or Footer.
  • Menu assignment -> Module Assignment: On all pages.
4. Now Log in to your Chatra Dashboard to start chatting with your website visitors and manage preferences.
